name: Sex Simulator - Bar Girls
description:
An interactive SEX SIMULATION game with VISUAL NOVEL elements, featuring HD GRAPHICS and hot ANIMATIONS.
Play the role of a gorgeous businesswoman and convince three sexy ladies to get naked with you before making them come.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Enter the world of SEX SIMULATOR - BAR GIRLS and step into the shoes of a generous business lady who likes to seal a deal by making her partners come.
Whether it be a lovely bank clerk looking for a job, a naughty gym trainer asking for a loan, or a sexy dancer auditioning for a spot in your new club, you cannot put them on your payroll without pleasuring them first.

The process is simple:
Pick a girl, use your charms to get her naked, and then choose between our selection of sex positions to make her come.
Repeat with the other two and show them the privileges of working for you.

Don’t worry if you're not a great talker. We have this part covered for you. All you need to do is flex those finger muscles to control the sex motion and make the ladies come before you run out of stamina.

You didn’t get it right on the first try? Well … it happens to the best of us.
The good part is you can always try again, and again, and again…until you leave every single one of them satisfied.

FEATURES
90+ HD quality renders
HD animations
